amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the appropriation for military construction for the Army by $10 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the funds appropriated in the bill for military construction for the Army by $10 million, from $625.6 million to $615.6 million. The intent of the amendment is to eliminate funding to develop the Barstow-Daggett air base in California.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 100 - 329 (Roll no. 393).
